traits.name: Heat
traits.desc: A seraph’s body generates heat. Creatures who touch the genie take 7 (2d6) fire damage. If the seraph genie uses a metal weapon adds this additional damage to the weapon’s attacks. A seraph genie can suppress this effect for 1 hour as a bonus action.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: A seraph genie’s innate spellcasting ability is charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can cast the following spells without requiring material components. * At will: detect evil and good, detect magic, flame blade, plane shift (self only), produce flame * 3/day each: fireball, flame strike, invisibility, see invisibility, wall of fire * 1/day each: fire storm, greater invisibility

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: A seraph genie makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Burst (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The seraph genie emits a blast of elemental fire in a 30-foot radius. All creatures in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a successful one.
